hero.badge: Inspiring growth, resilience, and renewed purpose.
hero.description: At <brand>change180</brand>, we help individuals and families experience meaningful, faith-rooted transformation by addressing emotional wellness, purpose, and personal growth.
hero.trustIndicator: You don't need to have it all figured out — you just need a willingness to take the next step.

about.headline: Hi, I'm Myra Z. Guzman, M.Ed.
about.paragraph1: I am a bilingual certified life coach and educator with a deep passion for helping others live fulfilling and faith-centered lives.
about.paragraph2: With over 17 years of experience supporting children, families, and adults through education, emotional development, and community-based services, I bring a unique blend of knowledge, empathy, and spiritual guidance to my coaching practice.
about.paragraph3: I created <brand>change180</brand> to serve those who want real change without judgment, faith without shame, and growth that feels both grounded and hopeful.
about.disclaimer: Coaching services are non-clinical and educational in nature and do not replace therapy.
about.imageAlt: Myra Z. Guzman, M.Ed. - Life Coach

whoWeHelp.headline: <brand>change180</brand> Is For You

results.basedOnAnswers: Based on your answers, here's what we recommend for you:
results.whyThisPackage: Why this package is right for you:

discovery.general: You're at the beginning of an exciting journey. A Discovery Session is the perfect way to explore your goals and see if coaching is right for you — with no pressure.
discovery.stress-overwhelm: You're dealing with a lot right now. A Discovery Session will help you identify what's weighing you down and create a clear first step forward.
discovery.career-purpose: Feeling uncertain about your direction is normal. Let's use this session to gain clarity on what matters most to you.
discovery.curious: Curiosity is a great starting point! This session will help you explore what coaching can offer without any commitment.

clarity.general: You're ready for focused change. The Clarity Package will give you the structure and support you need to move from confusion to confidence.
clarity.life-transition: Life transitions can feel overwhelming, but they're also opportunities for growth. This package will help you navigate this season with intention.
clarity.stress-overwhelm: Four weeks of focused support can make a real difference when you're feeling overwhelmed. Let's work together to find your peace.

rooted.general: You're ready for deep, lasting change. The Rooted & Renewed program will help you address patterns and build a strong foundation for growth.
rooted.faith-spiritual: Your desire for spiritual depth is beautiful. This program integrates faith into every aspect of your transformation journey.
rooted.healing-peace: Healing takes time and intentional work. Eight weeks gives us the space to address root issues and build lasting peace.

flourish.general: You're committed to comprehensive transformation. Flourish Forward is our most complete program for those ready to embrace lasting change.
flourish.fully-committed: Your level of commitment is inspiring! This 12-week journey will equip you with everything you need to flourish in every area of life.

family.general: Family is at the heart of what matters to you. Our family coaching will give you practical tools and faith-based guidance for stronger relationships.
family.parenting: Parenting is both rewarding and challenging. Together, we'll develop strategies that honor your values and support your children's growth.

faq.headline: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about life coaching and how we can support your journey.

whatIsCoaching.question: What is life coaching?
whatIsCoaching.answer: Life coaching is a collaborative partnership that helps you identify and achieve your personal and professional goals. Unlike therapy, which often focuses on healing past trauma, coaching is future-focused and action-oriented. I help you gain clarity, develop strategies, and take meaningful steps toward the life you want to live.

coachingVsTherapy.question: How is coaching different from therapy?
coachingVsTherapy.answer: Therapy typically addresses mental health diagnoses, past trauma, and emotional healing. Coaching focuses on personal growth, goal achievement, and moving forward. While therapy asks 'why did this happen?', coaching asks 'where do you want to go?' Coaching is educational and supportive, not clinical. If you need mental health treatment, I can help connect you with appropriate resources.

faithBased.question: Do I need to be religious to work with you?
faithBased.answer: Not at all. While my coaching is faith-centered and I draw from Christian principles, I welcome clients of all backgrounds. I respect your beliefs and will tailor our sessions to honor your values. My approach is faith-centered, not faith-pressured — you'll never feel judged or uncomfortable.

sessionLength.question: How long are coaching sessions?
sessionLength.answer: Individual sessions are 60 minutes. This gives us enough time to dive deep into your goals, reflect on progress, and create actionable next steps. Family and group sessions may vary in length depending on the needs of the participants.

virtualOrInPerson.question: Are sessions virtual or in-person?
virtualOrInPerson.answer: Both! I offer virtual sessions via secure video conferencing, which works great for busy schedules and clients outside my local area. In-person sessions are also available for those who prefer face-to-face connection. We'll find what works best for you.

howOften.question: How often do we meet?
howOften.answer: Most packages include weekly sessions, which provides consistency and momentum. However, we can adjust the frequency based on your needs and schedule. Some clients prefer bi-weekly sessions once they've built a strong foundation.

whatToExpect.question: What can I expect in a typical session?
whatToExpect.answer: Each session begins with checking in on your progress and wins since our last meeting. We'll then focus on the goals you've set, work through any challenges, and create clear action steps for the coming week. Sessions are supportive, encouraging, and always tailored to where you are in your journey.

pricing.question: How much does coaching cost?
pricing.answer: Investment varies by package. Discovery Sessions start at $55 for a single 60-minute session. Multi-week packages range from $360 (4 weeks) to $1,080 (12 weeks), offering better value for committed transformation. Family coaching sessions are $110 each. View our Packages section for full details.

insurance.question: Do you accept insurance?
insurance.answer: Life coaching is not covered by health insurance as it is educational and developmental in nature, not a clinical mental health service. However, coaching is often more affordable than therapy and many clients find it to be a worthwhile investment in their personal growth.

refunds.question: What is your cancellation policy?
refunds.answer: I understand life happens. Please provide at least 24 hours notice if you need to reschedule. Sessions cancelled with less than 24 hours notice may be forfeited. Package refunds are handled on a case-by-case basis.

howToStart.question: How do I get started?
howToStart.answer: The best way to start is with a Discovery Session. This 60-minute session allows us to get to know each other, discuss your goals, and determine if coaching is right for you. Click 'Book a Session' to schedule, or reach out through the contact form with any questions.

rightForMe.question: How do I know if coaching is right for me?
rightForMe.answer: Coaching is ideal if you're feeling stuck, seeking clarity, navigating a life transition, or wanting to grow in specific areas of your life. If you're ready to take action and are open to support and accountability, coaching can help you make meaningful progress. Take our free quiz to find your best-fit package!

bilingual.question: Do you offer services in Spanish?
bilingual.answer: Yes! I am fully bilingual and offer all coaching services in both English and Spanish. Many of my clients appreciate being able to express themselves in their native language. You can switch languages at any time during our work together.
